name: aBSiNTHEBBSStatus
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can get live updates from aBSiNTHE BBS via Alexa! Currently supported:

* Number of new message posts and responses for the day
* Number of new files uploaded for the day
* Number of files downloaded for the day
* Last caller online
* Sysop chat availability
* News item notifications

This will continue to be updated with new features as time goes on.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
